xxl.core.functions
Class FunctionMetaDataFunction<P,R,M>

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.functions.DecoratorFunction<P,R>
      xxl.core.functions.FunctionMetaDataFunction<P,R,M>
Type Parameters:
P - the type of the function's parameters.
R - the return type of the function.
M - the type of the meta data provided by this function.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function<P,R>, MetaDataFunction<P,R,M>, Decorator<Function<? super P,? extends R>>, MetaDataProvider<M>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CMDFunction
public abstract class FunctionMetaDataFunction<P,R,M>
extends DecoratorFunction<P,R>
implements MetaDataFunction<P,R,M>

This class provides a skeleton implementation based upon the DecoratorFunction for functions providing meta data. Functions inherited from this class are used to provide meta data information used for example by MetaDataCursors by implementing Object getMetaData() from the MetaDataProvider-interface.
